name: CFXMLEntityInfo
desc: Contains information describing an XML entity.

items.name: init(entityType: CFXMLEntityTypeCode, replacementText: Unmanaged<CFString>!, entityID: CFXMLExternalID, notationName: Unmanaged<CFString>!)
var entityID: CFXMLExternalID
items.desc: entityID.systemID will be NULL if entityType is internal.

items.name: var replacementText: Unmanaged<CFString>!
items.desc: NULL if entityType is external or unparsed, otherwise the text that the entity should be replaced with.
